*Physical oceanographer by training. Observational oceanographer by practice. <br> 
Applied machine learning researcher and data scientist by happenstance.*

***

Matt Grossi is a physical oceanographer with a decade of experience conducting oceanographic research, supporting state-of-the-art regional ocean observation technologies, and participating in field campaigns. His research interests include ocean-atmosphere dynamics, ocean prediction and forecasting, and applying machine learning to ocean data for analysis and exploration.
